channel.title: Server issues?
channel.description: ok im having problems with me server not long ago it was saying that my server is full but i got max connections set to 100000 and now it is saying when people try to sign in that they are already signed in how do i fix these issues

item.title: Server issues?
item.dc:creator: @sp00nkitty sp00nkitty
item.description:
@sp00nkitty wrote:

[quote=“jat1801, post:2, topic:81174”]Try Restarting Your Server and change that to like 100[/quote]no thats not the problem its always been like that tho and ive never had problems it has only just started today[br][size=1]Posted on: April 17, 2007, 10:53:51 AM[/size][hr]dont worry i found the problem my self it was in client.java i had to add a few things
